text:
e="preserve">Ekow Hayford (24 December 1970 – 9 October 2020) was a Ghanaian politician. He was a member of the Seventh Parliament of the Fourth Republic of Ghana representing the Mfantseman Constituency in the Central Region. He was a member of the New Patriotic Party. Hayford was born in Mankessim, Ghana.
On 9 October 2020, while returning from a campaign tour, he was shot dead by unknown persons at the age of 49.

annotations.surface_form: Parliament of the Fourth Republic of Ghana
